checkAging(Exchange) - Method in class org.eclipse.californium.core.network.stack.congestioncontrol.Cocoa
Aging check: 1.) If the overall estimator has a value below 1 s and 16*RTO seconds pass without an update, double the value of the RTO (apply cumulatively!) 2.) If the overall estimator has a value above 3 s and 4*RTO seconds pass without an update, reduce its value
